value.title: StarCraft 2: ByuN's SUPER GREEDY Build Order! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of high level StarCraft 2 between ByuN (Terran) and Classic (Protoss). Classic starts this series off with a cheesy build order that would surely punish a greedy Terran strategy. So what does ByuN do in the rest of this series? Triple Command Center off of one Marine.
